title: Stage Lv4-A5-S18
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. (business variant 1)
I understand your concerns. (business variant 1)
I will resolve this issue immediately. (business variant 1)
We will provide appropriate compensation. (business variant 1)
We will ensure this doesn't happen again. (business variant 1)
Your feedback helps us improve. (business variant 1)
I will find a satisfactory solution. (business variant 1)
We will thoroughly investigate the situation. (business variant 1)
We want to restore your trust. (business variant 1)
We will provide improved service. (business variant 1)
